title: I forgot my old e-mail address I want to pass it on my new e-mail address account but I do not have
body:
I'm waiting for you Riot support team help :({{item:3151}} {{item:1038}} {{champion:32}} {{summoner:3}}


HELP ME PLEASEEE !!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: Did you already submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)? We can assist you with updating your email, but we'll need to get you in touch with an account specialist.
